image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: A Representative from Wisconsin; born in Appleton, Outagamie County, Wis., December 12, 1949; attended Appleton East High School, Appleton, Wis., B.S., University of Wisconsin, Madison, Wis., 1972; M.D., University of Wisconsin, Madison, Wis., 1976; physician; founder, Kagen Allergy Clinics; professor, Medical College of Wisconsin, Milwaukee, Wis.; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Tenth Congress and to the succeeding Congress (January 3, 2007-January 3, 2011); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Twelfth Congress in 2010.

asset.name: K000365_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
